thread.title: I Don’t Care That My Sports Heroes Are Pro-Trump
thread.title_full: I Don’t Care That My Sports Heroes Are Pro-Trump - WSJ

author: David Oshinsky
title: I Don’t Care That My Sports Heroes Are Pro-Trump
text:
In my family, being a sports fan always came with political baggage. My father pointed me toward the Brooklyn Dodgers when I was a boy because the team had recently integrated Major League Baseball and—a point of ethnic pride in our household—even kept an occasional Jewish journeyman on the roster. Watching Jackie Robinson steal home against the lily-white Yankees or knowing that Jake Pitler was absent from the first-base coaching box in observance of Yom Kippur meant a lot more to us than winning or losing.
Three years...
